Buy/Preorder this album if you haven't already.
this is my first comment ever, but i'm going to let you know that i did pre-order this vinyl and its sitting in my room right now. was desperate for a digital copy so thank you sir
I must thank you as well... as much fun as it would be to have received the album I pre-ordered in the mail and hear it first that way, I had to hear this as soon as possible.
